name: Ludo Star: Offline
description:
Download on Play store:


Ludo star is the best offline ludo game you can find now on the play store.

With a simple design so anyone can play. you can also play as a group.

Ludo star features :

❌No age limit to play this board game

🔥 colorful graphics

🤔Play with your friends

😝Simple design

💪🏻Can even Play offline

Download this fun game for free

Try Ludo Star for free!

We are looking forward to getting feedback from all of you! Please leave your reviews so we can keep improving the game.
